pli-tv-kd11:1.1.6: alamattatarā ca → alamatthatarā ca (sya-all, pts1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:1.3.1: asantuṭṭhitāya → asantuṭṭhiyā (bj, pts1ed); asantuṭṭhatāya (sya-all); vīriyārambhassa → viriyārambhassa (bj, sya-all, pts1ed); vīriyārabbhassa (mr); Atha kho bhagavā te → paṇḍukalohitake (sya-all)
pli-tv-kd11:6.2.9: okāsaṁ kāreti, codeti, sāreti, bhikkhūhi sampayojeti → bhikkhū bhikkhūhi sampayojeti (sya-all)
pli-tv-kd11:9.2.2: āpattiṁ āropetabbo → āpatti āropetabbā (bj, sya-all); āpattiṁ ropetabbo (pts1ed)
pli-tv-kd11:13.6.28: (…) → (yepi te manussā pubbe saddhā ahesuṁ pasannā tepi etarahi assaddhā appasannā yānipi tāni saṅghassa pubbe dānapathāni tānipi etarahi upacchinnāni riñcanti pesalā bhikkhū nivasanti pāpabhikkhū) (sya-all)
pli-tv-kd11:18.1.9: Adhivāsesuṁ kho therā bhikkhū → adhivāsesuṁ kho te therā bhikkhū (sya-all)
pli-tv-kd11:22.3.13: sudhammo bhikkhu cittassa gahapatino dassanūpacāraṁ avijahāpetvā savanūpacāraṁ avijahāpetvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ kārāpetvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīdāpetvā añjaliṁ paggaṇhāpetvā taṁ āpattiṁ desāpetabbo”ti → sudhammaṁ bhikkhuṁ … sā āpatti desāpetabbāti (si, sya-all)
pli-tv-kd11:25.2.28: channo bhikkhu saṅghena āpattiyā → channo bhikkhu āpattiyā (bj, pts1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:27.1.27: na bhikkhu bhikkhūhi bhedetabbo → na bhikkhū bhikkhūhi bhedetabbā (sya-all)
pli-tv-kd11:28.1.4: na garuṁ kariṁsu → na garukariṁsu (bj, sya-all, pts1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:31.1.44: channo bhikkhu saṅghena āpattiyā → channo bhikkhu āpattiyā (bj, pts1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:32.4.34: gaddhabādhipubbo, saṅghena pāpikāya → gandhabādhipubbo saṅghena pāpikāya (sya-all); gaddhabādhipubbo pāpikāya (pts1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.33: uppannānipi vaḍḍhare → uppannāni ca vaḍḍhare (bj); uppannāpi pavaḍḍhanti (pts1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.151: pañcakāti nāmakā → dve pañcakoti nāmako (pts1ed, mr)
pli-tv-kd11:35.1.156: paṭisārī ca → paṭisārīnaṁ (bj); paṭisāri ca (sya-all, pts1ed); Pabbajjā → pabbajaṁ (bj); pabbājā (pts1ed, mr)
